title: can't save file
body:
### expected behaviour
one should be able to save changed file (files section)

### actual behaviour
when "save" button is clicked it changes to "saving..." and stays that way and does not save the file + session is freezed, you cannot do anything else other than close the web browser and login into site again. this happens sometimes.

### steps to reproduce
1. change content of some file stored in files section
2. push save button

### server configuration
operating system:
linux mint 14

web server: 
apache 2.2.22

database:
i think database is not used in my installation

php version:
5.4.6-1ubuntu1.4

owncloud version:
5.0.12

### client configuration
browser:
firefox 24 and 25. maybe even 23.

operating system:
linux mint 14/15

### logs
#### web server error log
can't find it, there's nothing in /var/log/apache2/access.log, it's empty, error.log there doesn't have anything interesting

#### owncloud log (data/owncloud.log)
{"app":"php","message":"allowed memory size of 536870912 bytes exhausted (tried to allocate 130968 bytes) at \/var\/www\/owncloud\/lib\/db.php#365","level":4,"time":"2013-11-01t13:02:48+00:00"}

... i already tried rising the memory to 512 mb, not enough, now i raised it to 1024 mb

#### browser log
nothing interesting there
